showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Bugenhagen
“He's quiet and very deep.
You thought he was an adult?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // Bugenhagen
“The sounds of the stars in the heavens.
While this goes on, planets are born, and die.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
That was a scream from the Planet.”{PAUSE}“Didn't you hear it? As if to say…
I hurt, I suffer…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Red XIII}
“{Cloud},
this is my grandfather, Bugen.”{PAUSE}“He is incredible.
He knows everything.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Red XIII}
“Please stop, Grandfather.
I'm 48.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Red XIII}
“…Grandfather.
I want to be an adult.”{PAUSE}“I want to grow up to be able to
protect you and the village.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // {Red XIII}
“They have come here on a journey
to save the planet.”{PAUSE}“Why don't you show them
your apparatus?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // {Red XIII}
“He brought friends, too.
I'll go get them.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:35}); // {Red XIII}
“I can't leave you like this,
Grandfather!”{PAUSE}“It's the duty of…
Seto's son, to guard this
canyon and her people…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:42}); // {Red XIII}
“…
Don't scare me like that, Grandfather!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:35}); // {Red XIII}
“I can't leave you like this,
Grandfather!”{PAUSE}“It's the duty of…
Seto's son, to guard this
canyon and her people…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // Bugenhagen
“Don't worry.
My machine won't run away.
Go and invite your friends.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
I hear that you looked
after Nanaki. ”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Bugenhagen
“Nanaki is still a child you see.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Nanaki's tribe has incredible longevity.”{PAUSE}“So you see his 48 years would
only be equivalent to say that of
a 15 or 16 year old in human reckoning.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
No Nanaki.
You can't stand on your own yet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // Bugenhagen
“To do that now would
destroy you in the long run.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Bugenhagen
“Reaching up into the heavens, threatening
to snatch the very stars from the great
city of Midgar. You've seen it, haven't you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Bugenhagen
“Well, that's a bad example.
Looking up too much makes you
lose perspective.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // Bugenhagen
“When it's time for the Planet to die,
you'll understand that you know
absolutely nothing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
It may be tomorrow, or 100 years from now…
But it's not long off.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // {Cloud}
“How do you know this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Bugenhagen
“I hear the cries of the Planet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
To save the planet? Ho Ho Hoooo!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // Bugenhagen
“But, then again, I guess it
wouldn't hurt to show him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // Bugenhagen
“Don't worry.
My machine won't run away.
Go and invite your friends.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // “Several odd looking
people are here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // Bugenhagen
“The whole place has gotten
busy all of a sudden.”

ops.description: { let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Bugenhagen
“Here, over here.
The door's unlocked, come in.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // {Red XIII}
“{Cloud},
please call one of them.”{PAUSE}“Only three people can fit
in Grandfather's machine.”

ops.raw: d0 ba 00 8b ff 90 fd 76 00 52 ff 90 fd

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:32}); // Elder Hargo
“I hope great Bugenhagen will take care and
not overexert himself.”{PAUSE}“'Ho Ho Hoooo.'
I may be light,
But I'm not as young as Nanaki.”{PAUSE}“Oops. That will only get you angry.
You're just like me.
Ho ho ho.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:46}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho…Hoooo.
You?”{PAUSE}“It's been a while…since I've been out.
I think I must have…tired
myself out a bit.”{PAUSE}“Ahh…don't tell Nanaki.
He'll only worry…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:36}); // Bugenhagen
“…listen, Nanaki.
I think you may already know.”{PAUSE}“If you have any mission in life,
it is not to defend this valley.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:37}); // Bugenhagen
“Look at the withering mountain grass.
Listen to the warble of
the new born chocobo's.”{PAUSE}“Look always to the eternal flow of time
which is far greater than
the span of a human life.”{PAUSE}“It will teach you more,
than staying here in the valley…”{PAUSE}“What you will see will eventually
become a part of the Lifestream.”{PAUSE}“For my children…
And for your children…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:38}); // “So please, Nanaki…
Go with {Cloud}…
And use your eyes…your ears…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:41}); // “…oh yes.
This is for you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:43}); // Bugenhagen
“What? You surprised yourself.
Now take this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:45}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho…Hoooo.
Do not worry about me.
I'll be watching the future of the Planet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:45}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho…Hoooo.
Do not worry about me.
I'll be watching the future of the Planet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // Bugenhagen
“…listen, Nanaki.
I think you may already know.”{PAUSE}“If you have any mission in life,
it is not to defend this valley.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // Bugenhagen
“Look at the withering mountain grass.
Listen to the warble of
the new born chocobo's.”{PAUSE}“Look always to the eternal flow of time
which is far greater than
the span of a human life.”{PAUSE}“It will teach you more,
than staying here in the valley…”{PAUSE}“What you will see will eventually
become a part of the Lifestream.”{PAUSE}“For my children…
And for your children…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // “So please, Nanaki…
Go with {Cloud}…
And use your eyes…your ears…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho…Hoooo.
Now, now. Don't look like that.
I'm all right.”{PAUSE}“It's a big world and you must
go out and see it…
You may even find your life's mate.
You never know.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // Bugenhagen
“Oh yes…take this along.
I think it will look good on you now.”

ops.raw: d0 86 00 af ff bf fe 23 00 81 ff bf fe

ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:2, type:2, adjust:0});

dialogStrings: Bugen Research Center

{Red XIII}
“{Cloud},
this is my grandfather, Bugen.”{PAUSE}“He is incredible.
He knows everything.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
I hear that you looked
after Nanaki. ”

Bugenhagen
“Nanaki is still a child you see.”

{Red XIII}
“Please stop, Grandfather.
I'm 48.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Nanaki's tribe has incredible longevity.”{PAUSE}“So you see his 48 years would
only be equivalent to say that of
a 15 or 16 year old in human reckoning.”

{Cloud}
“15 or 16!?”

Bugenhagen
“He's quiet and very deep.
You thought he was an adult?”

{Red XIII}
“…Grandfather.
I want to be an adult.”{PAUSE}“I want to grow up to be able to
protect you and the village.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
No Nanaki.
You can't stand on your own yet.”

Bugenhagen
“To do that now would
destroy you in the long run.”

Bugenhagen
“Reaching up into the heavens, threatening
to snatch the very stars from the great
city of Midgar. You've seen it, haven't you?”

Bugenhagen
“Well, that's a bad example.
Looking up too much makes you
lose perspective.”

Bugenhagen
“When it's time for the Planet to die,
you'll understand that you know
absolutely nothing.”

{Cloud}
“…When the Planet dies?”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
It may be tomorrow, or 100 years from now…
But it's not long off.”

{Cloud}
“How do you know this?”

Bugenhagen
“I hear the cries of the Planet.”

{Cloud}
“What's that?”

Bugenhagen
“The sounds of the stars in the heavens.
While this goes on, planets are born, and die.”

{Cloud}
“What was that?”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
That was a scream from the Planet.”{PAUSE}“Didn't you hear it? As if to say…
I hurt, I suffer…”

{Red XIII}
“They have come here on a journey
to save the planet.”{PAUSE}“Why don't you show them
your apparatus?”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
To save the planet? Ho Ho Hoooo!”

Bugenhagen
“But, then again, I guess it
wouldn't hurt to show him.”

{Red XIII}
“He brought friends, too.
I'll go get them.”

{Red XIII}
“{Cloud},
please call one of them.”{PAUSE}“Only three people can fit
in Grandfather's machine.”
“Bugenhagen!”

“Several odd looking
people are here.”

Bugenhagen
“The whole place has gotten
busy all of a sudden.”

Bugenhagen
“Don't worry.
My machine won't run away.
Go and invite your friends.”

Bugenhagen
“Here, over here.
The door's unlocked, come in.”

Elder Hargo
“I hope great Bugenhagen will take care and
not overexert himself.”{PAUSE}“'Ho Ho Hoooo.'
I may be light,
But I'm not as young as Nanaki.”{PAUSE}“Oops. That will only get you angry.
You're just like me.
Ho ho ho.”

{Red XIII}
“Grandfather!!”

Bugenhagen
“…Nanaki?
…you're still…here?”

{Red XIII}
“I can't leave you like this,
Grandfather!”{PAUSE}“It's the duty of…
Seto's son, to guard this
canyon and her people…”

Bugenhagen
“…listen, Nanaki.
I think you may already know.”{PAUSE}“If you have any mission in life,
it is not to defend this valley.”

Bugenhagen
“Look at the withering mountain grass.
Listen to the warble of
the new born chocobo's.”{PAUSE}“Look always to the eternal flow of time
which is far greater than
the span of a human life.”{PAUSE}“It will teach you more,
than staying here in the valley…”{PAUSE}“What you will see will eventually
become a part of the Lifestream.”{PAUSE}“For my children…
And for your children…”

“So please, Nanaki…
Go with {Cloud}…
And use your eyes…your ears…”
“Ho Ho…”

{Red XIII}
“Grandfather!?
Grandfather!!!”

“…oh yes.
This is for you.”

{Red XIII}
“…
Don't scare me like that, Grandfather!”

Bugenhagen
“What? You surprised yourself.
Now take this.”
Received "Limited Moon"!

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho…Hoooo.
Do not worry about me.
I'll be watching the future of the Planet.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho…Hoooo.
You?”{PAUSE}“It's been a while…since I've been out.
I think I must have…tired
myself out a bit.”{PAUSE}“Ahh…don't tell Nanaki.
He'll only worry…”

{Red XIII}
“…”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho…Hoooo.
Now, now. Don't look like that.
I'm all right.”{PAUSE}“It's a big world and you must
go out and see it…
You may even find your life's mate.
You never know.”

Bugenhagen
“Oh yes…take this along.
I think it will look good on you now.”

{Red XIII}
“Grandfather…”
